features: Power of 5G: Get next-level power for everything you love to do with Samsung Galaxy 5G; Share more, game harder, experience more and never miss a beat
Single Take AI: Capture video and multiple types of images with one tap of the shutter button; Lenses, effects and filters capture the best of every moment, every time

Hi-Res Camera Zoom: Capture hi-res images as if you’re 3 feet away, from 100 feet away; Whether you want to zoom in close from afar or magnify details nearby, the new 30x Space Zoom gives you impressive power and clarity
Bright Night Mode: Capture crisp images and vibrant video in Bright Night mode and create high-quality content in low light – no flash needed

Super Fast Charging: Charge up quicker with Super Fast Charge so you can keep moving with more juice; Give your buds – or Galaxy buds – a boost of power with Wireless PowerShare right from Galaxy S20+ Plus 5G
body.description: Superpower everything you create with pro-grade quad lenses and 30x Space Zoom. Make your world bigger with Galaxy S20+ 5G's fully decked camera system, super-fast charging, and cinematic 6. 7” Infinity-O display. Galaxy S20+ 5G’s modern design gives you an immersive, cinema-quality experience with next-level functionality. Take pro-grade, hi-res images and video with a groundbreaking 64MP camera and full system of studio lenses with super stabilization. Features like the Single Take AI make it quick and easy to capture multiple photos and video with a single tap. Zoom in close, even from 100 feet away, and capture crisp images at night, even without flash, with Bright Night mode. Share your content in real time with double-tap sharing and get hours of power from minutes of charge with Super Fast Charging. Galaxy S20+ 5G’s intelligent battery lasts all day to power every scroll, click, call, tap, playlist and season finale. Do more of what you love with the device that gives you more.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 33 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like my new Samsung galaxy S20 plus phone, enjoying the quality and different apps and it's easy to use 😊.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice phone too bad it's got a glass back
reviews.reviewText: Great phone.... recognizes my 2g sd card.... broke face a few days after getting it due to the case it was in. Really like that I can sync to my tv. Samsung hit it out of the park on this one imo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 4 months
reviews.reviewText: I was happy in the beginning but the sim reader started to malfunction. The sim reader started shorting out, so sometimes I would have service sometimes it told me I had no carrier. I tried contacting the seller, but they never got back with me. Very disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Se le daño el botón del volumen
reviews.reviewText: El celular llego sellado y en buen estado, pero a los días se le cayó el botón de subir y bajar el volumen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Can't get a better deal!! Screen was perfectly fine. No tint like it says there could be. Not even a scratch on the screen or camera. Few on the edges and that's it. Highly recommend this company

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not compatible with Verizon Wireless or Straight talk. Does not come with a SIM card either.
reviews.reviewText: Will not work with Verizon or Straight talk. I tried porting this phone for 7 days with no luck. Phone comes with no SIM card. This phone (only) takes a GSM SIM card because it is ATT and T mobile compatible. I went through 4 different SIM Cards with no activation luck so instead of going without a phone for 1 more day I went to Cricket Communications and they were able to activate this phone. I was able to keep my old phone number witch was surprising. Do your research before you spend your money and roll the dice on this item. GSM SiM card only. There are 3 Different types of SIM cards, make sure your carrier has one compatible that will work on this phone, has to be ( ATT & T-Mobile compatible.) This is a GSM phone. I went thru hell for 7 days with no phone but phone works fine now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars My Personal Experience
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this phone a bout a week ago. In my effort to move to this new phone I experienced a couple of issues. (1). The phone I received has a problem with the camera. Whenever I start to take pictures, I may be able to take one, maybe even two then I start getting a message about camera failure and I'm not able to take any pictures for a while and then somehow it clears up and I can can take maybe 1 or 2 pics again then the error happens again. Based on internet research, camera failure on this model seems to be a known problem. (2). I have my service with Verizon, when I switched to this phone, I could not use Verizon's visual voicemail service. I had to live with basic voice mail by dialing *86 and listening to my voice mails. This may be a Verizon issue, but I thought I should share it. Because of these two problems I have returned my phone for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Got a different phone
reviews.reviewText: Bought a Used - Like New from Amazon Warehouse but instead got a renewed phone you find from a third party seller. it came in a brown box not in the original packaging like the description said and the phone upon inspection have scratches, really dirty charging port and speakers were dirty too having something like ear wax inside, camera have small scratches. And it's funny I got a Motorola brand wall charger and one of those cheap charging cables. Totally not the phone I bought and neither a renewed like it claims
